snippet.title: Sonic Frontiers - Nintendo Direct Mini: Partner Showcase | 6.28.2022
snippet.description:
Sonic Frontiers is coming to Nintendo Switch this holiday! Wishlist today: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/sonic-frontiers-switch/

Sonic Frontiers is a new style of Sonic gameplay featuring action platforming, trademark Sonic speed and an expansive world that offers non-linear gameplay.

#SonicFrontiers #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/Nintendo
